module.name: Asterisk API
module.description: This module is used to add AMI Users
module.changelog: *16.0.12* FREEI-4793 *16.0.11* FREEPBX-23396 Cannot Update Manager-Configuration *16.0.10* SCD-107 added cdr event filter to receive cdr events in sangomartapi *16.0.9* SCD-32 add more rtapi entries to manager_additional.conf *16.0.8* FREEI-3953 Added validation for password field *16.0.7* FREEI-3375 SQL Injection in Asterisk Manager *16.0.6* FREEI-3453: add sangomartapi conference app's entry to manager_additional.conf *16.0.5* FREEI-3488 *16.0.4* FREEI-3453: add sangomartapi_conference entry as an asterisk manager *16.0.3* FREEPBX-22019 Change default AMI address binding to localhost *16.0.2* Packaging of ver 16.0.2 *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
